languages.text: "Вы должны знать: человек, звавший себя Комиссаром, был предателем и пособником ксеносов. Его слова о побеге были ложью".

traits.locale_text: "Вы должны знать: человек, звавший себя Комиссаром, был предателем и пособником ксеносов. Его слова о побеге были ложью".

languages.text: "There is something you must know: the man who called himself the Commissar was a traitor and an accomplice of the xenos. His promises of escape were nothing but lies."
languages.original_text: "Вы должны знать: человек, звавший себя Комиссаром, был предателем и пособником ксеносов. Его слова о побеге были ложью".

traits.locale_text: "There is something you must know: the man who called himself the Commissar was a traitor and an accomplice of the xenos. His promises of escape were nothing but lies."
"There is something you must know: the man who called himself the Commissar was a traitor and an accomplice of the xenos. His promises of escape were nothing but lies."
"There is something you must know: the man who called himself the Commissar was a traitor and an accomplice of the xenos. His promises of escape were nothing but lies."
"There is something you must know: the man who called himself the Commissar was a traitor and an accomplice of the xenos. His promises of escape were nothing but lies."
"There is something you must know: the man who called himself the Commissar was a traitor and an accomplice of the xenos. His promises of escape were nothing but lies."
"There is something you must know: the man who called himself the Commissar was a traitor and an accomplice of the xenos. His promises of escape were nothing but lies."

languages.text: 「知っておかなければならないことがある。コミッサーと名乗った男は裏切り者で、異種族の共犯者だった。彼の逃亡の約束は嘘にすぎなかったのだ」
languages.original_text: "There is something you must know: the man who called himself the Commissar was a traitor and an accomplice of the xenos. His promises of escape were nothing but lies."

traits.locale_text: 「知っておかなければならないことがある。コミッサーと名乗った男は裏切り者で、異種族の共犯者だった。彼の逃亡の約束は嘘にすぎなかったのだ」

languages.text: “有件事情我必须告诉你们：那个自称政委的家伙是个叛徒，他是异形的帮凶。至于他说的逃跑什么的，那全都是在骗你们。”
languages.original_text: "There is something you must know: the man who called himself the Commissar was a traitor and an accomplice of the xenos. His promises of escape were nothing but lies."

traits.locale_text: “有件事情我必须告诉你们：那个自称政委的家伙是个叛徒，他是异形的帮凶。至于他说的逃跑什么的，那全都是在骗你们。”

languages.text: «Hay algo que deben saber: el hombre que se hacía llamar Comisario era un traidor y cómplice de los xenos. Sus promesas de fuga no eran más que mentiras».
languages.original_text: "There is something you must know: the man who called himself the Commissar was a traitor and an accomplice of the xenos. His promises of escape were nothing but lies."

traits.locale_text: «Hay algo que deben saber: el hombre que se hacía llamar Comisario era un traidor y cómplice de los xenos. Sus promesas de fuga no eran más que mentiras».

languages.text: "Ihr müsst etwas wissen: Der Mann, der sich Kommissar genannt hat, war ein Verräter und hat gemeinsame Sache mit den Xenos gemacht. Seine Versprechungen, dass Ihr fliehen könnt, waren nichts als Lügen."
languages.original_text: "There is something you must know: the man who called himself the Commissar was a traitor and an accomplice of the xenos. His promises of escape were nothing but lies."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst etwas wissen: Der Mann, der sich Kommissar genannt hat, war ein Verräter und hat gemeinsame Sache mit den Xenos gemacht. Seine Versprechungen, dass Ihr fliehen könnt, waren nichts als Lügen."

languages.text: « Il y a une chose que vous devez savoir : celui qui se faisait appeler le commissaire était en fait un traître et un complice des xénos. Il vous a menti en vous promettant de vous aider à vous enfuir. »
languages.original_text: "There is something you must know: the man who called himself the Commissar was a traitor and an accomplice of the xenos. His promises of escape were nothing but lies."

traits.locale_text: « Il y a une chose que vous devez savoir : celui qui se faisait appeler le commissaire était en fait un traître et un complice des xénos. Il vous a menti en vous promettant de vous aider à vous enfuir. »

languages.text: "Bilmeniz gereken bir şey var: Kendine Komiser diyen o adam, hainin teki ve zenoların yardakçısıydı. Kurtuluş vaatleri de birer yalandan ibaretti."
languages.original_text: "There is something you must know: the man who called himself the Commissar was a traitor and an accomplice of the xenos. His promises of escape were nothing but lies."

traits.locale_text: "Bilmeniz gereken bir şey var: Kendine Komiser diyen o adam, hainin teki ve zenoların yardakçısıydı. Kurtuluş vaatleri, sadece yalandan ibaretti."
